actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill providing for temporary controls of certain increases in utility rates.

summary.text: Prohibits any utility or power company licensed to do business in the United States from instituting an increase in electrical utility rates for any of its consumers based on a decrease in revenue caused by conservation efforts utilized by the consumers. Provides for a penalty of a fine of up to $50,000 and imprisonment for a term of up to one year for officers and directors of companies who violate this Act.

titles.title: A bill providing for temporary controls of certain increases in utility rates.
